Siberys Mark of Detection.name: Siberys Mark of Detection
Siberys Mark of Detection.flavor: Nothing can be hidden from you.
keywords: Personal   Effect: You gain blindsight 10 until the end of the encounter.
Siberys Mark of Detection.effect: You gain blindsight 10 until the end of the encounter.

Siberys Mark of Finding.name: Siberys Mark of Finding
Siberys Mark of Finding.flavor: Your dragonmark flares as you gaze at your foe. Now nothing can prevent you from hunting down your enemy.
keywords: Ranged 20  Target: One creature  Effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target grants combat advantage to you. Your attacks against the target deal 1d6 extra damage. The target does not benefit from cover or concealment against you as long as you can see the target, and you know the target’s precise location. If the target is more than 3 squares away from you at the start of your turn, you can teleport to any square within 5 squares of the target as a move action.
Siberys Mark of Finding.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target grants combat advantage to you. Your attacks against the target deal 1d6 extra damage. The target does not benefit from cover or concealment against you as long as you can see the target, and you know the target’s precise location. If the target is more than 3 squares away from you at the start of your turn, you can teleport to any square within 5 squares of the target as a move action.

Siberys Mark of Handling.name: Siberys Mark of Handling
Siberys Mark of Handling.flavor: You grant a beast or summoned creature its own mind and will.
keywords: Personal   Effect: You gain an extra standard action each turn until the end of the encounter. You can use this action only to use an at-will beast power or to command a summoned creature. Alternatively, your mount can use this extra action to attack.
Siberys Mark of Handling.effect: You gain an extra standard action each turn until the end of the encounter. You can use this action only to use an at-will beast power or to command a summoned creature. Alternatively, your mount can use this extra action to attack.

Siberys Mark of Healing.name: Siberys Mark of Healing
Siberys Mark of Healing.flavor: Healing energy spreads out from you to bolster your allies, especially those who are near death.
Siberys Mark of Healing.target: You and each ally in the burst
Siberys Mark of Healing.effect: The target regains hit points as if he or she had spent 2 healing surges, or 3 healing surges if he or she is bloodied.

Siberys Mark of Hospitality.name: Siberys Mark of Hospitality
Siberys Mark of Hospitality.flavor: You create a zone of safe refuge around yourself.
Siberys Mark of Hospitality.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you move. You and any ally gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses while within the zone. If you or an ally spends a healing surge while within the zone, that character regains 20 additional hit points. Your allies can teleport 10 squares to any square within the zone as a move action.

Siberys Mark of Making.name: Siberys Mark of Making
Siberys Mark of Making.flavor: What your magic has wrought, your dragonmark makes real.
keywords: Personal   Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you automatically sustain any of your powers that normally require a minor action to sustain without spending an action. You sustain such powers even if you are stunned or unconscious.
Siberys Mark of Making.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you automatically sustain any of your powers that normally require a minor action to sustain without spending an action. You sustain such powers even if you are stunned or unconscious.

Siberys Mark of Passage.name: Siberys Mark of Passage
Siberys Mark of Passage.flavor: You open a passage that transcends the limits of space, inviting your allies to follow you through it.
Siberys Mark of Passage.effect: You teleport 20 squares, and each ally adjacent to your starting position can teleport to a square adjacent to your new location. Neither you nor a teleporting ally needs to see your destination.

Siberys Mark of Scribing.name: Siberys Mark of Scribing
Siberys Mark of Scribing.flavor: You scribe the Prophetic symbols that spell your enemies’ doom.
Siberys Mark of Scribing.effect: The burst becomes a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. Enemies within the zone gain vulnerable 10 to all damage, and your allies can score critical hits against enemies within the zone on a natural attack roll of 19–20.

Siberys Mark of Sentinel.name: Siberys Mark of Sentinel
Siberys Mark of Sentinel.flavor: You become the perfect sentinel, unwavering in your dedication to your task.
keywords: Personal   Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +5 power bonus to your Will, and you automatically succeed on saving throws against charm effects.
Siberys Mark of Sentinel.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +5 power bonus to your Will, and you automatically succeed on saving throws against charm effects.

Siberys Mark of Shadow.name: Siberys Mark of Shadow
Siberys Mark of Shadow.flavor: Pulling the shadows around you, you disappear from view.
Siberys Mark of Shadow.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you are invisible to any creature against which you have any cover or concealment.

Siberys Mark of Storm.name: Siberys Mark of Storm
Siberys Mark of Storm.flavor: Howling winds swirl around you and thunder rumbles in the sky.
Siberys Mark of Storm.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. The zone is difficult terrain for creatures on the ground. When a creature flies to a square within the zone, you can slide that creature a number of squares equal to its fly speed as an opportunity action, and then its movement ends. You can fly your speed and hover while within the zone. In addition, thunder and lightning attacks deal 1d10 extra damage against targets within the zone.

Siberys Mark of Warding.name: Siberys Mark of Warding
Siberys Mark of Warding.flavor: You create a nigh-impenetrable barrier to protect your allies.
Siberys Mark of Warding.effect: The burst becomes a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Enemies can’t enter the zone, and allies gain a +2 power bonus to their defenses while within the zone. The zone ends if a creature inside the zone attacks a creature outside the zone.
